archimate:Representation.name: Transaction Author Agreement
archimate:Representation.documentation: A Controlled Document which functions as the legal agreement between the Sovrin Foundation and any Transaction Author which must be digitally signed or otherwise explicitly agreed to by the Transaction Author in order to write a Transaction. See Sovrin Ledger Access Policies and Appendix E.
